data.name: Datadog Public Screenboard
data.description:
Fix styles to make screenboards look better on tv's:
(press `f` to toggle tv-mode, and `esc` to go back to normal mode)

- Hide copyright notice as it overlaps with the widgets
- When in TV mode:
  - Hide huge header
  - Hide mouse cursor when in tv mode
  - Hide overflow to prevent unnecessary scrollbars

data.name: Paul's Online Dark Mode
data.description: Dark mode for Paul's online notes, as well as some readability enhancements

data.name: Waterfall.Social — Fixed Header & Misc.
data.description: Fixes the Navigation on Waterfall.Social to the top of the page and condenses the Blogs dropdown, makes the next button on the dashboard 100% width for easier navigation, makes the commission marketplace link stick as you scroll, makes people's blog information stick as you scroll on the default blog theme, unhides the blog information on smaller window sizes for desktop, and has optional fixed editor controls.

data.name: Funimation Dark Mode
data.description:
This will restyle Funimation to remove the harsh, bright white colors, making it easier on the eyes.

It also makes the video player bigger, to make it easier to watch without being in fullscreen.
